channel.title: The Recipe Book
channel.description: Recent content on The Recipe Book

item.title: Worlds Best Steak Marinade
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 1/2 cup Balsamic Vinegar 1/4 Cup Soy Sauce 3 TBSP minced garlic 2 TBSP honey 2 TBSP olive oil 2 TSP ground black pepper 1 TSP Worcestershire Sauce 1 TSP Onion Powder INSTRUCTIONS:

item.title: Simple Steak Recipe
item.description: A Simple Steak Recipe. Click here See our cooking guide. INGREDIENTS: Steak Worcestershire sauce olive oil Garlic oregano Parsley thyme salt pepper Garlic butter INSTRUCTIONS: Cover the steaks in Garlic, oregano, Parsley, thyme, salt, pepper. Drip Worcestershire sauce and olive oil on the steaks. Rub oils and seasons on the steak, make sure to cover the sids. Place steaks in fridge and let sit for as log as you like.

item.title: About
item.description: I created this site to host, my favorite recipes so i organize them and share them. Also i don’t have to read trough a a life’s story before i get to the meat and potatoes of the recipe. Also i don’t have to scroll thought 50 ads.

item.title: Easy Air Fryer Wings
item.description: Easy Air Fryer cooking method for naked wings. Cover with your own sauce, ranch or eat them naked after cooking INGREDIENTS: Nonstick cooking spray, for the basket Thawed Wings INSTRUCTIONS: Spray the basket of a 3.5-quart air fryer with cooking spray and set aside. Pat the chicken wings dryPlace the wings in the fryer basket so they are not touching Set the air fryer to 360 degrees F and cook for 12 minutes, then flip the wings with tongs and cook for 12 minutes more.

item.title: Keto Breakfast Egg Bites
item.description: Recipe makes close to 12 egg bites depending on what size eggs you use, you can easily double or triple the recipe, to make more or less… INGREDIENTS: 10 eggs 1 cup of any cheese you would like. 1/2 cup full fat cottage cheese 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt Couple cracks of fresh black pepper As much bacon as you want Non-stick spray I like canola oil INSTRUCTIONS: Pre-heat oven to 300 F degrees and place a baking dish that is filled with some water on the bottom rack.
